title: For Better or For Worse - Complete Run, 1979-2008 {WebComixFan}
description:
"FOR BETTER OR FOR WORSE" Comic Strip

"For Better or For Worse" (gocomics.com/forbetterorforworse) by Lynn Johnston ran in its original incarnation from 1979 to 2008. The strip chronicled the lives of the Patterson family and their friends in the fictitious Toronto-area suburban town of Milborough, Ontario. A signature element of the strip was that its characters aged in real time, so that the 29 years of "For Better or For Worse" literally told the story of 29 years of its characters' lives.

This torrent collects the complete run of "For Better or For Worse" from its premiere in 1979 through its conclusion in 2008, in a set of CBR files, one for each year. An additional CBR file collects the "new-run" strips which ran from 2008 to 2010, revisiting early storylines.

The strips were all downloaded from the gocomics.com Web site. Unfortunately, as a result, the collection is only "nearly" complete, as there are some strips missing from the online archive. Most notably, Sunday strips from 1979 and daily (non-Sunday) strips from the last few months of 1984 are absent
